schema.description: DataWorks工作空间的ID。您可以进入DataWorks管理控制台获取。
层级的类型，包括1（逻辑层级）和2（物理层级）。
每页显示的条数，默认为10条。

Success.description: 是否成功查询层级列表。

LevelType.description: 层级的类型，包括1（逻辑层级）和2（物理层级）。

403.errorMessage: Access is forbidden. Please first activate DataWorks Enterprise Edition or Flagship Edition.

429.errorMessage: The request for this resource has exceeded your available limit.
The request for this resource has exceeded your daily available limit.
The DataWorks system is busy. Try again later.
Your request is too frequent. Try again later.

500.errorMessage: An internal system error occurred. Try again later.
An internal system error occurred. Try again later.

responseDemo:

  "HttpStatusCode": 200,
  "ErrorMessage": "The specified parameters are invalid.",
  "RequestId": "abc",

    "TotalCount": 10,
    "LevelList": [

}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<ListTableLevelResponse>
    <HttpStatusCode>200</HttpStatusCode>
    <ErrorMessage>The specified parameters are invalid.</ErrorMessage>
    <RequestId>abc</RequestId>
    <Success>true</Success>
    <ErrorCode>1031203110005	</ErrorCode>
    <TableLevelInfo>
        <TotalCount>10</TotalCount>
        <LevelList>
            <LevelType>1</LevelType>
            <Description>层级描述</Description>
            <Name>层级1</Name>
            <ProjectId>123</ProjectId>
            <LevelId>123</LevelId>
        </LevelList>
    </TableLevelInfo>
</ListTableLevelResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询层级列表
summary: 调用ListTableLevel查询层级列表。不建议使用该API，后续将有新API上线覆盖此功能。
